cnd13:2.1: **Yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantī**ti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—
cnd13:3.1: **Taṇhā yassa na vijjatī**ti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—
cnd13:4.1: **Kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo**ti kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
cnd13:5.1: **Vimokkho tassa kīdiso**ti vimokkho tassa kīdiso kiṃsaṇṭhito kiṃpakāro kiṃpaṭibhāgo icchitabboti vimokkhaṃ pucchatīti—
cnd13:8.7: **Yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantī**ti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti—
cnd13:10.2: **Taṇhā**ti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā.
cnd13:10.4: **Taṇhā yassa na vijjatī**ti taṇhā yassa natthi na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti—
cnd13:11.1: **Kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo**ti kathaṃkathā vuccati vicikicchā.
cnd13:11.4: **Kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo**ti kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti—
cnd13:12.1: **Vimokkho tassa nāparo**ti natthi tassa aparo vimokkho.
cnd13:15.1: **Nirāsaso so uda āsasāno**ti nittaṇho so, udāhu sataṇho rūpe āsīsati, sadde …pe…
cnd13:15.31: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme āsīsati sādiyati pattheti piheti abhijappatīti—
cnd13:16.2: **Paññāṇavā so**ti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
cnd13:16.3: **Uda paññakappī**ti udāhu aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā kappeti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetīti—
cnd13:17.4: Atha vā aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
cnd13:17.6: saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhanaṃ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṃ sammappadhānadhanaṃ iddhipādadhanaṃ indriyadhanaṃ baladhanaṃ bojjhaṅgadhanaṃ maggadhanaṃ phaladhanaṃ nibbānadhananti.
cnd13:17.7: Tehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
cnd13:17.8: Atha vā sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakko.
cnd13:17.9: **Muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijaññan**ti sakka yathāhaṃ muniṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭivijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyanti—
cnd13:18.2: **Tan**ti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi.
cnd13:18.3: **Viyācikkhā**ti ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi.
cnd13:21.1: **Nirāsaso so na ca āsasāno**ti nittaṇho so.
cnd13:21.5: diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme nāsīsati na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nābhijappatīti—
cnd13:22.2: **Paññāṇavā**ti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
cnd13:22.3: **Na ca paññakappī**ti aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā na kappeti diṭṭhikappaṃ vā na kappeti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti—
cnd13:23.2: **Munī**ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ …pe… saṅgajālamaticca so muni.
cnd13:23.3: **Evampi todeyya muniṃ vijānā**ti todeyya, evaṃ muniṃ jāna paṭijāna paṭivijāna paṭivijjhāti—
cnd13:24.2: **Akiñcanan**ti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ.
cnd13:24.3: Yassetāni kiñcanāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni, so vuccati akiñcano.
cnd13:25.1: **Akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattan**ti akiñcanaṃ puggalaṃ kāme ca bhave ca asattaṃ alaggaṃ alaggitaṃ apalibuddhaṃ nikkhantaṃ nissaṭaṃ vippamuttaṃ visaññuttaṃ vimariyādikatena cetasā viharantanti—
